response.original_title: The Infinite Deep: Stories of Lost Submarines
response.overview: A deep dive into the world’s most notorious cases of lost submarines—from the first experimental submersible to the recent Ocean Gate Titan tragedy that captivated the world. THE INFINITE DEEP goes far beyond a simple, linear telling of disaster. It is a terrifying journey into what victims experience when confronted with the kind of unforgiving circumstances the sea presents.
response.title: The Infinite Deep: Stories of Lost Submarines
